response.title: The King's Speech
response.info: A historical drama about King George VI's struggle to overcome his speech impediment.

response.title: The Social Network
response.info: A biographical drama about the creation of Facebook and the conflicts surrounding its founders.

response.title: 12 Years a Slave
response.info: A powerful drama depicting the true story of Solomon Northup, a free man sold into slavery.

response.title: Birdman
response.info: A dark comedy-drama about a washed-up actor trying to revive his career through a Broadway play.

response.title: Spotlight
response.info: A gripping drama about the Boston Globe's investigation into child abuse within the Catholic Church.

response.title: Room
response.info: A heart-wrenching drama about a mother and son escaping captivity and adjusting to freedom.

response.title: Moonlight
response.info: An intimate drama exploring the life of a young black man growing up in Miami.

response.title: La La Land
response.info: A romantic musical drama about two aspiring artists navigating love and ambition in Los Angeles.

response.title: Parasite
response.info: A dark social satire about class disparity and the unexpected consequences of a poor family infiltrating a wealthy household.

response.title: Little Women
response.info: A modern adaptation of the classic novel, focusing on the lives of the March sisters.
